title: Participant
description: The collection of all data related to a specific participant in the context of a specific clinical trial.

cimac_participant_id.$comment: With `in_doc_ref_pattern` here, there's no need to specify it each time cimac_participant_id is $ref'ed, constrain will be pulled in place by ref resolver automatically, assuring that it will be checked for every cimac_participant_id $ref.
cimac_participant_id.description: Participant identifier assigned by the CIMAC-CIDC Network. Formated as: CM-????-????.

arm_id.description: Identifies the trial arm to which the participant belongs. Example: Arm A.

cohort_id.description: Identifies the treatment cohort to which the participant belongs. Example: Cohort A.

gender.description: Identifies the gender of the participant.
